pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sayanagatassa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:7.1: “Na sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk64:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca antamaso chamāyampi nipannassa sayanagatassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
